title: Seaside Breeze And Exceptional Views in Nilwella - LIP 163
details: LIP-163 This long narrow piece of land has an amazing sea frontage, overlooking the rocky coastline of the Indian ocean. 120 Perches ready for development, there is a small house on the property consisting of 3 rooms, a living room and kitchen. Swimmable and surfing beaches are within 5 minutes’ drive and for an added bonus Galle Fort is only an hour and a half drive from this property, a great spot for tourists to access most of the Southern coast.
